# calendar4kweeks

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

calendar4kweeks is a R+ggplot2 clone of the [4k weeks calendar](https://4kweeks.com/). 

This program creates a calendar; mapping each year and week of an 80 year lifespan and filling in the passed time. Custom colors supported.
